Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to establish the Bureau of Land Management Foundation.
short_title: Bureau of Land Management Foundation Act

summary.text: Bureau of Land Management Foundation Act - Establishes the Bureau of Land Management Foundation as a nonprofit corporation to encourage, accept, and administer private gifts for the benefit of, and to conduct activities and encourage assistance in support of the purposes and programs of, the Bureau of Land Management. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Bureau of Land Management Foundation Act
Bureau of Land Management Foundation Act
A bill to establish the Bureau of Land Management Foundation.
